title.english: A Good Librarian Like a Good Shepherd

description:
The story is set at Shiomi Academy, a vast, prestigious academy with a Daitoshokan (literally, "great library") that rivals Japan's national library. As a member of the Library Club, Kyoutarou Kakei goes to Daitoshokan to enjoy reading by himself. He then meets a second-year girl named Tsugumi Shirasaki through the efforts of a so-called "shepherd" who fulfills people's wishes. Eventually, more girls join the club thanks to the "shepherd."

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Cosplay

tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

node.description: **August** (オーガスト, Ōgasuto?)  is a Japanese visual novel studio under the publisher Hazuki. On the Internet, August is known by the slang term Hachigatsu (八月?). Hazuki and Hachigatsu mean August in Japanese.

Bekkankou is a game creator and illustrator.

[Blog](https://ameblo.jp/bekkankou/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/bekkankou)

Mitsuki Nakae is a prolific doujin artist who has contributed to a large number of colaborative works and who currently releases her own work under the name ABSOLUTE CASTAWAY. Between 2009 and 2013 she was the leader of doujin circle Re:sonera (now disbanded). She is also half of the duo Shoujo Byou who have made several releases via Lantis.

Nakae made her musical debut in 2005. Her earliest commercial releases (as part of Shoujo Byou) date from 2009. After working occassionally as a seiyuu for several years, she put this activity on a professional footing in 2013. She also gave her first solo concert in the same year.

Ceui is a Japanese singer–songwriter originally from Chiba, Japan, though she grew up in Fukuoka. Ceui's name is derived from the Portuguese word for sky, céu.
